mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", p.name AS "broker.name", a.platform AS "platform", a.code AS "code", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker p ON p.id = a.broker_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_trace_code( id, broker_id, platform, code, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{broker.id}, #{platform}, #{code}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_trace_code SET broker_id = #{broker.id}, platform = #{platform}, code = #{code}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
